data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Brussels.
In the minute 2, Wim Smet awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Mouscron at Lotto Park.
Wim Smet signals a free kick to Anderlecht.
In the minute 4, Wim Smet signals a throw-in for Anderlecht, close to Mouscron's area.
Mouscron needs to be cautious. Anderlecht have an attacking throw-in.
Can Anderlecht capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Mouscron's half?
In the minute 6, Throw-in high up the field for Anderlecht in Brussels.
Corner awarded to Anderlecht.
Wim Smet signals a free kick to Mouscron in their own half.
In the minute 9, Ball safe as Anderlecht is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Anderlecht in the half of Mouscron.
Eric Junior Bocat for Mouscron has been booked by Wim Smet and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 12, Throw-in Mouscron.
Throw-in for Mouscron at Lotto Park.
Wim Smet awards Mouscron a goal kick.
In the minute 14, Anderlecht have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Anderlecht in the half of Mouscron.
Throw-in for Anderlecht close to the penalty box.
In the minute 16, Anderlecht's Jeremy Doku misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Mouscron goal kick.
Anderlecht awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Mouscron in their own half.
Throw-in for Mouscron in their own half.
Mouscron awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Anderlecht in their own half.
Wim Smet signals a Mouscron throw-in in Anderlecht's half.
Wim Smet signals a free kick to Mouscron in their own half.
In the minute 21, Anderlecht's Anouar Ait El Hadj gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Brussels.
Free kick for Mouscron in their own half.
In the minute 24, Peter Zulj (Anderlecht) gets a yellow card.
Anderlecht have a dangerous throw-in.
Beni Badibanga for Mouscron gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 26, Wim Smet awards Anderlecht a goal kick.
Wim Smet signals a free kick to Mouscron in their own half.
Anderlecht awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 27, Can Anderlecht capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Mouscron's half?
Throw-in for Mouscron in their own half.
In Brussels a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 29, Anderlecht push forward at Lotto Park and Michael Murillo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Mouscron defence.
Ball safe as Mouscron is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Mouscron.
In the minute 32, Can Mouscron get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Anderlecht's half?
Anderlecht awarded a free kick in their own half.
Beni Badibanga gets his shot on target but fails to score for Mouscron.
In the minute 34, Deni Hocko of Mouscron gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Anderlecht goal kick.
Mouscron awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 35, Free kick Mouscron.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Anderlecht at Lotto Park.
In the minute 37, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Eric Junior Bocat.
Anderlecht to take a throw-in in Mouscron territory.
Eric Junior Bocat is back on the pitch.
In the minute 39, Anderlecht are in shooting range from this free kick.
Eric Junior Bocat (Mouscron) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
Anderlecht have been awarded a corner by Wim Smet.
In the minute 42, Anderlecht's Adrien Trebel gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Mouscron defender.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jean Onana for Mouscron who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 44, Jean Onana for Mouscron is back on the field again.
Attention is being given to Mouscronâ€™s Herve Koffi and play has been suspended briefly.
Robbe Quirynen is replacing Virgiliu Postolachi for the away team.
Herve Koffi returns to the field for Mouscron after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Anderlecht.
Can Anderlecht get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mouscron's half?
Wim Smet will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Anderlecht to take a throw-in in Mouscron territory.
Goal kick for Mouscron at Lotto Park.
Wim Smet awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Anderlecht at Lotto Park.
Free kick for Anderlecht in their own half.
In Brussels Anderlecht drive forward through Peter Zulj. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 45, Anderlecht have been awarded a corner by Wim Smet.
The first-half is over at Lotto Park.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Wim Smet signals a free kick to Mouscron in their own half.
Free kick for Mouscron in their own half.
Wim Smet signals a free kick to Anderlecht in their own half.
In the minute 50, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Anderlecht's Adrien Trebel gets in a shot on goal at Lotto Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Anderlecht.
In the minute 51, Anderlecht surge into the attack at Lotto Park but Nany Dimataâ€™s header is off-target.
Mouscron have a goal kick.
Anderlecht have been awarded a corner by Wim Smet.
In the minute 53, Mouscron awarded a free kick in their own half.
Anderlecht's Anouar Ait El Hadj breaks free at Lotto Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Mouscron goal kick.
In the minute 55, Ball safe as Mouscron is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Vincent Kompany (Anderlecht) is making a first substitution, with Percy Tau replacing Anouar Ait El Hadj.
Free kick for Mouscron in their own half.
In the minute 56, Anderlecht awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Anderlecht in Brussels.
Wim Smet signals a free kick to Mouscron in their own half.
In the minute 59, Mouscron awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wim Smet signals a free kick to Mouscron in their own half.
Anderlecht drives forward and Adrien Trebel gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 61, Anderlecht drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Anderlecht in their own half.
Anderlecht have been given a penalty at Lotto Park...
In the minute 63, Goal! Anderlecht take a 1-0 lead thanks to a Nany Dimata spot-kick..
The home team replace Nany Dimata with Antoine Colassin.
Free kick for Anderlecht in the half of Mouscron.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Anderlecht.
Wim Smet awards Mouscron a goal kick.
Wim Smet signals a Mouscron throw-in in Anderlecht's half.
In the minute 69, It's a goal kick for the away team in Brussels.
Imad Faraj is replacing Beni Badibanga for Mouscron at Lotto Park.
Free kick Mouscron.
In the minute 70, Adrien Trebel (Anderlecht) has received a first yellow card.
Mouscron have a goal kick.
In Brussels a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 74, Mouscron are coming forward and Imad Faraj gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Anderlecht at Lotto Park.
Goal kick for Mouscron at Lotto Park.
In the minute 75, Fernando Da Cruz is making the team's third substitution at Lotto Park with Harlem Gnohere replacing Marko Bakic.
Wim Smet signals a free kick to Anderlecht.
In Brussels, Marco Kana of Anderlecht is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 77, Anderlecht have been awarded a corner by Wim Smet.
Corner awarded to Anderlecht.
Throw-in for Anderlecht in the half of Mouscron.
In the minute 79, Anderlecht have been awarded a corner by Wim Smet.
Wim Smet awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 82, Important block from the Mouscron defence as Percy Tau fires in a strike for Anderlecht.
Jean Onana is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
The home team have replaced Adrien Trebel with Yari Verschaeren. This is the third substitution made today by Vincent Kompany.
In the minute 84, Corner awarded to Anderlecht.
Anderlecht have been awarded a corner by Wim Smet.
Jean Onana is back on his feet again.
In the minute 85, Throw-in Anderlecht.
Throw-in for Mouscron in the half of Anderlecht.
Wim Smet signals a Mouscron throw-in in Anderlecht's half.
In the minute 88, Corner awarded to Mouscron.
Anderlecht awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Wim Smet awards the away team a throw-in.
Anderlecht's Percy Tau is whistled for offside at Lotto Park.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
In Brussels Anderlecht attack through Antoine Colassin. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Brussels.
Wim Smet signals a free kick to Mouscron.
Mouscron have been awarded a corner by Wim Smet.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
Harlem Gnohere equalizes with a header to make it 1-1.
